
 * Logging API
 * Call API
 * Utils API


= Call Api =

_*call:answer()*_


Answers incoming call, e.g. codecs are negotiated and 200 OK is sent to UAC.



{{{
incoming =ivrworx.INCOMING;
assert(incoming);

res =call:answer();
assert (res == ivrworx.API_SUCCESS)
}}}

----

_*call:hangup()*_

Hangs up the call

{{{
res = call:hangup();
assert (res == ivrworx.API_SUCCESS)
}}}


---
